text: '''Deanna O'Lykos '''is a lowRed from the Martian mining colony of Lykos. She is the mother of Darrow, Kieran and Leanna and the widow of Dale.
name: Holiday

text: Deanna suffered at least one stroke at some point before the Lion's Rain, and has grown physically weaker as a result. However, she still has a strong personality, and is able to recognize Darrow when he returns to Lykos.
name: Holiday

text: In the Dark Age Dramatic Personae, Dancer is listed as Deanna's husband. This was later clarified by Pierce on twitter as a mistake.
name: Holiday

text: es:Deanna hu:Lykosi Deanna Category:Females Category:Reds Category:Characters Category:Red Rising Characters Category:Golden Son Characters Category:Morning Star Characters Category:Iron Gold Characters Category:Dark Age Characters
name: Holiday
